data.speaker: User
data.message: Hello PERSON_FIRSTNAME_2, I am having a problem of using library Bloomberg terminal. I fail to download the Bloomberg data from the computer, and I went to the online Bloomberg service. It said that the terminal has reached the download limit for a month, and thus suggested I change one terminal. However, I have tried more than 3 terminals in the room and they all failed to download. I am having an important project right now, and I have turned to professor and he suggested I ask librarian. I am wondering whether I can download Bloomberg data through other ways? Could you please lift up the download limit of terminal? Or what else I can do to download the Bloomberg data?

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: Hi PERSON_LASTNAME_1, I would need to ask my colleague whether there is any terminal that has not hit the download limit yet. It is lunch time now, can I get back to you via email?

data.speaker: User
data.message: Sure! Thank you very much. Have a great lunch! I am looking forward to your reply :)

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: Thank you for your patience, I will drop them an email and we will get back to you as soon as possible.

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: I'll also reach out to them once they are back from lunch.

data.speaker: Help Desk
data.message: Hi PERSON_LASTNAME_1, I have emailed our Business librarian who is supporting Bloomberg. He will get back to you. Meanwhile, I will close this chat. Should you require assistance on other matters, do contact us again.
